title: Corn â€” Northern leaf blight
description: Long, elliptical tan lesions on leaves often caused by Exserohilum turcicum; manage with resistant varieties and fungicide applications under high disease pressure.

treatment.chemical: Apply azoxystrobin or pyraclostrobin starting at V6 stage if disease is present.
treatment.organic: Use resistant varieties and crop rotation; monitor closely during warm, wet weather.
